data.text: Keela wooi é wosu é lo kulakɛlɛma nɛmɛi ʋa.
Zeluzalɛme, leeni vaa zu è ɠɛai ga taa wolai zɔngɔi wola su,
Ɗa-ɠɔɔɠɔ ɠundiɠiiti ti ʋelani ʋɔɔma,
Naa ɠa é ba, gè bo wo ma:
Mazɔlɔɔ ziiɓɔlɔ voloi ʋe ta nimizai ta faa zuɠoloɠologi,
Elame zalaʋusuiti ti mɛɛinti ta mɛɛn ɠaeiti seɠea,
Ee, Zeluzalɛme, ɗa-nɛmɛiti ti ʋagai ti leʋe ti pɛ ba,
Zuda yooi makɛ ani la mɔ ná.
Wo pɛtɛga zeɠei mɔin ʋele liegɔi
Wo Zeluzalɛme ʋɛlɛiti gaaluni,
Wo ziɛ zosuʋɛ ɓɛtɛni siɠi felegɔiti zɔɠɔzuʋɛ
Naama volo ná, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii wo lolini
Wɛlɛ ziiɠaanɛɛi ʋa ta koozunɛɛi,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii keela wooi nii wo mà:
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii wooi ɠaa:
‹È-ɠɔligi ɠa ga ɓɛgele ʋɛ,
Wɛlɛ, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa è ʋilisu ya ɠoozama,
toɠa è laaʋili eɠɛ ani ɓuun,
«Nà è ɓɛɛzu è-losuʋɛ,»
Naama volo ná, nà nà-botiɠɛ nui loli,
Nà maaɠili ga ɗa-zeɠeungi,
Nà Davide ná-masadai ma ɓaɠui ve zea,
Nà topele ɓɛtɛ kpe eɠɛ gulu ɠaazoɓagi pilɛgai ada ʋagɔi,
«Ná-pɛlɛyeɠei wu nuiti pɛ,
Naama volo ná, gulu ɠaazoɓagi kpadɔai ada ʋagɔi, tɔɔ ɠa ɠula,»
